title: Epistemology of Love | John Vervaeke, N.T. Wright, & Esther Lightcap Meek
description:
In this video, we'll compare side by side some relevant clips from cognitive scientist John Vervaeke, biblical scholar and theologian N.T. Wright, and philosopher Esther Lightcap Meek on the subject of epistemology.

We cannot truly know without love.

For the original videos:

Vervaeke on Rebel Wisdom:
https://youtu.be/BWAJ5xi4mhk

Esther Lightcap Meek with Wipf and Stock interview:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wAt4epHvXQY&ab_channel=WipfandStockPublishers

N.T. Wright on the Veritas Forum:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nr-yoty_cHw&ab_channel=TheVeritasForum
